articles.title: Goge Africa launches destination West Africa project | The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News — Saturday Magazine — The Guardian Nigeria News – Nigeria and World News - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Having identified the gaps in domesticating Intra-Africa tourism, Goge Africa and its partners have come together to launch the Destination West Africa project in order to encourage Africans to travel within Africa.
